message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is quite a bit higher for me. Could you do $11,000?
I appreciate your understanding, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,250?
